title: Golf: Rolling Ball
instructions:
A golf ball is sitting on the tee. Your job is to roll it into the hole!

You have one function:
- `move_ball_right()` moves the ball one unit to the right

The ball needs to move **60 times** to reach the hole. Use a **repeat loop** to move it there efficiently.

Your solution should be just 3 lines of code!
hints: The ball needs to move 60 times to the right
Use a repeat loop instead of writing move_ball_right() 60 times
The repeat loop syntax is: repeat 60 times do ... end
